name: Streamflow
description: Streamflow is a secure, easy-to-use, and powerful token infrastructure for creating and distributing tokens from creation through maturity. Streamflow's product suite includes features such as: - crypto-native payroll, - no-code, large-scale (vested) airdrops, - token vesting, - token locks (and LP locks), - community dashboards, - SPL token staking - launchpad (coming soon) - digital assets secondary marketplace (coming soon)
